name: VigilConnect
0:
”Alexa, tell vigil connect I want a drink”
”Alexa, tell vigil connect I'm ready”
”Alexa, tell vigil connect thanks for the help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vigil connect
des:
With the Vigil Connect skill residents of independent living senior housing communities equipped with the Vigil System can communicate with care staff using their voices. Calls are raised on the Vigil System and staff are notified through active call screens, pagers, wireless phones, or the Vigil Mobile app.

This skill is intended for residents of independent living communities.

This skill requires a Vigil System to operate. Information on the Vigil System can be found at http://www.vigil.com
